fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

roman_candles.name: Roman Candles
roman_candles.description: This 8 ball classic gives you all the Blue effects you can handle!

kingslayer.name: Kingslayer Artillery Shell
kingslayer.description: You get 18 of the hardest hitting, most colorful mortars on the market.

poppers.name: Poppers
poppers.description: Small poppers that explode when you throw them on the ground.

spinners.name: Spinners
spinners.description: Small spinning caps that shoot out colorful sparks.

sky_lantern.name: Sky Lantern
sky_lantern.description: Chinese sky lantern that will fly as far as the eye can see.

c4.name: C-4 Plastic Explosive
c4.description: Will take out doors, walls, or an enemy.

he_explosive.name: High Energy
he_explosive.description: High explosives detonate with explosive velocity ranging from 3 to 9 km/s.

le_explosive.name: Low Energy
le_explosive.description: Low explosives are compounds where the rate of decomposition proceeds through the material at less than the speed of sound.

black_powder.name: Black Powder
black_powder.description: Buy black powder in bulk to make your own demolition explosives.

flash_powder.name: Flash Powder
flash_powder.description: Buy flash powder in bulk to make your own demolition explosives.
